function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate access to nature may impact the mental and physical health of occupants, especially during prolonged lockdown periods.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate covid-19 prevention measures in apartment units","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited mobility and regulation in a pandemic area","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need to adjust apartment design to increase resilience towards covid-19 and improve resident comfort","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of technology for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risk due to accelerated digital transformation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective management and governance in dealing with contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated innovations in technologies may lead to security vulnerabilities in online platforms and digital systems, increasing the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telehealth technologies and platforms may lead to accessibility issues for individuals with limited digital literacy or technological resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robust testing for innovative technologies and solutions may lead to deployment of unproven or flawed systems, increasing the risk of technological failures and negative impact on public health and safety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of surveillance technologies leading to unmonitored spread of the infection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient use of supply chain technologies leading to shortages of essential healthcare products.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased power consumption after lockdown may lead to higher pollution levels and environmental health risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination and compliance with public health measures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and education about preventive measures and accurate information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to follow established protocols and safety procedures by healthcare workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent consumption of alcohol could potentially increase the health problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thermal scanners are not an effective method for diagnosis of covid-19, as it can only detect fever and infected individuals may not have fever yet.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased usage of mobile applications may lead to prolonged screen time, contributing to sedentary behaviors and potential health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly designed or maintained mobile health m-health applications may lead to inaccurate health information, misdiagnosis, and ineffective treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in mobile applications may result in unauthorized access to personal health information and potential data breaches.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots in healthcare could transmit contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overreliance on robots in healthcare may lead to reduced human interaction and personalized care, impacting patient well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper data security and privacy measures in robotics and communication systems poses a risk of sensitive healthcare information exposure.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of samples during drone transportation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate public engagement for supply requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of surveillance drones leading to privacy concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines during the delivery of goods and basic needs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transportation of biological samples by drones","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Delivery of medical supplies to austere territories using drones","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of infection through patient bookings and virtual doctor interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on iot for healthcare operations and drug delivery during epidemics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for the delivery of medical supplies and goods during epidemics.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited use of ai in surgical fields may hinder the potential for quality healthcare and evidence-based clinical decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to implement ai in the surgical field for treating covid-19 infected patients may hinder the use of ai for patient treatment and ventilator parameter adjustments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited utilization of ai technology in clinical trials and medicine development may slow down the process of achieving precise results and accelerating medicine and vaccine development.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited implementation of ai and machine learning in healthcare","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential reliance on ai and machine learning for critical healthcare decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot and drone technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance may infringe on privacy rights of individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance technology may be used for purposes other than controlling the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on surveillance technology may create a false sense of security.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online education platforms may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly managed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Live-streamed online sessions may pose a risk of disease transmission if participants are not following hygiene guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online competitions and initiatives may inadvertently lead to gatherings that increase the risk of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreads easily and infected individuals may not show symptoms for 1-14 days.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robots assisting healthcare workers may fail to prevent the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized or maintained.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Technological strategies for work from home, distance learning, and surveillance may lead to increased reliance on technology and potential privacy and security risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exponential increase in the use of telemedicine technology and chatbots","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in getting basic needs during quarantine period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
